content.text: Philly Community Wireless is dedicated to providing free public WiFi, particularly for low-income individuals and those experiencing homelessness. As a volunteer with PCW, I worked on an interactive map that displayed deployed wireless hardware alongside relevant census data, such as neighborhood income levels.

Developed and maintained a mapping system that visualized network coverage, deployed access points, and key demographic data. Enabled interested users to identify coverage gaps and optimize future deployments.
Integrated census data to highlight areas most in need of free WiFi access. Ensured the map was accessible and user-friendly for both community organizers and technical contributors.
